snippet.title: Hollow Knight [Hidden Dreams DLC] ► 100% Complete Guide!!!
snippet.description:
All secret bosses, all new locations, secret lore, and more! We tell you how to fight the Grey Prince, White Defender, and Revek, we locate the stag station, and we go over ways to get the best out of the new dream ability! The free Hidden Dreams update gives us a ton of new secrets and adventures, so let's get started!

MUSIC: Hollow Knight Official Soundtrack
FOOTAGE: Mostly recorded myself but also used from these channels due to time constraints and me wanting to get this out as soona s I could. Visit these links to see the full videos.
Juha Borén - The new Nosk: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fzFRR0kuq1M
The Bright King - Hollow knight Hidden Dreams Revek's Defeat: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dlFiPgPu2M8&t=87s
allthemighty - Hollow Knight New Revek fight: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2vjj7SZXlb0
Enthusiast - How NOT to beat Revek (Glade of Hope) - Hollow Knight DLC [PC 1080p 60 fps]: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=te6uoFxCfGM
raphidy17 - Hollow Knight - Rescuing Bretta: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y6b2_qbbTlk
